name: Dodge or Die (itch) (Nothing, Huw, HaywireJo)
description:
Roll the dice each time you attack, hoping luck is on your side as you battle it out against fearsome bosses. Dodge incoming attacks until your piece on the board reaches its final destination in this board-game inspired boss-rush. 

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Roll: Left Click
  • Pause: p

Code: Bix Men (Nothing#3367)

Art: HaywireJo

Audio: Huw Roberts
